segments.text: Is that your phone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , it's my new business phone . Do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's very impressive . Can you use the Internet on your phone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , it's got wireless Internet access .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's really convenient . Does it have the Bluetooth ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , but I don't really use it that often . Have you ever used it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no , but I think it'd be really great for people like you who are always on the go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , I guess I should try to use it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: does it have a camera ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: of course it does . Doesn't every new phone include a camera these days ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess so . Would you mind if I checked my email quickly ? I'm supposed to be getting an important email this evening from a client .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure . Here you go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: have you checked your voicemail recently ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , why ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think this icon means that you have a voicemail message .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , yeah . Probably . I don't really know how to use this phone yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you want to listen to your messages first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , it's ok . Check your email first ; I'll check my unbox later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm surprised you don't use more of the features on your phone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm surprised you know so much about it . Where's your phone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it quit working last week and I haven't had a chance to buy a new one yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: how have you been living without a cell phone for a week ? hasn't it been driving you carry being without a phone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's not that bad . It kind of feels like I'm on vacation , not having to answer my phone all the time !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: let's go shopping . You can't depend on public phones in this day and age !
segments.speaker: S2
